title: Metro: Last Light, one of my favorite shooters ever, is free on Steam
description: You've got until May 25 to make it yours.

title: Diablo 4 has a two week-early 'launch trailer' set to a Billie Eilish song that is remarkably not 'Bad Guy'
description: It's certainly a gameplay trailer, but is it launch?

title: Fortnite has dropped Trios mode with zero explanation, and fans aren't happy
description: The addition of Ranked played in the 24.20 update came at a cost.

title: This woman married 63 people in Stardew Valley, including, uh, Zoro from One Piece, and she refuses to stop there
description: I don't want to know what her personal calendar looks like.

title: The first aftermarket Steam Deck screen upgrade is here, but it sure seems like a bad idea
description: DeckHD is going to enable 1200p gaming on Valve's handheld, but is that a problem that needed fixing?

title: System Shock 2 Enhanced Edition shows off a major visual upgrade in new screens: 'All cinematics, textures, characters and weapon models have been updated'
description: Nightdive Studios shared some new screens from its upcoming System Shock 2 re-release.

title: Co-op survival game Nightingale delayed again
description: Originally planned for 2022, then the first half of 2023, it's now scheduled for an early access launch this fall.

title: The Diablo 4 Demon 'Meat' Shake finally let me know what Hell tastes like, and it's very chunky
description: There is no meat in this thing, but it tastes like there's meat in this thing.

title: The Matzah brawl: Jewish moms judge The Sims' latest culinary addition
description: "There can never be too much challah!"

title: Developer of The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story reveals new base building RTS
description: Build a fortress, piece by piece, and defend it from invaders in tower defense strategy Cataclismo.

title: Stray Gods is a musical RPG where your choices also change the chorus
description: Stray Gods debuted a new look at gameplay during the Humble Showcase.

title: An environmentalist brawler is the second Black Game Developer Fund game that Humble will publish
description: Breeze in the Clouds is about a corgi who beats up pollution.

title: Creator of defunct skyship MMO Worlds Adrift is trying again with a co-op survival game where 'your skyship is your home in the clouds'
description: The makers of MMO Worlds Adrift are back with another sky-exploring sandbox, this time for 1-6 players.

title: Wizard of Legend is getting a sequel with 'improved 3D graphics, an expanded storyline, and even online multiplayer'
description: Wizard of Legend 2 is being developed by Children of Morta studio Dead Mage.

title: PC Gamer Chat Log Episode 12: Tropes, tropes everywhere!
description: Robin Valentine joins Mollie and Lauren to talk about the good, bad, and ugly of videogame level tropes.

title: The Epic Store's 2023 Mega Sale kicks off with a free copy of Death Stranding for everyone
description: The Epic Games Store's big annual sale is live now and runs until June 15.

title: Hawken Reborn isn't a comeback for the brilliant mech FPS, it's a total disaster
description: Even with the early access caveat, this is a disappointment.

title: You're going to start getting 'Epic Rewards' on the Epic Games Store
description: Plus, the 2023 Mega Sale is live now.

title: UK chancellor wags his finger at CMA after Activision acquisition block, urging it to 'understand its wider responsibilities'
description: Jeremy Hunt's comments come after Microsoft lauded the EU as "more attractive place" to do business than the UK.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 is both a reboot and a sequel, and it's coming in September with 'a new fighting system, game modes and fatalities'
description: Liu Kang has made his own universe, but not everything is chill.

title: Journey developers' cozy MMO is finally flying onto PC
description: Sky will also arrive with cross-platform multiplayer.

title: Saudi Arabia now owns 10% of Electronic Arts
description: The country's investment fund significantly increased its stake.

title: Nvidia's $299 RTX 4060 means we're finally getting a next-gen GPU that costs less than the graphics card it's replacing
description: The Nvidia RTX 4060 Ti is coming May 24 for $399, with a $299 RTX 4060 following in July. And yes, there really is going to be a 16GB RTX 4060 Ti at $499, too. For... reasons.

title: Firmament review
description: A beautiful but flawed new adventure from the creators of Myst.

title: Google released a .zip web domain and people can't decide if it's the phishing apocalypse or just as bad as any other dodgy link
description: Nowadays .zip can denote a file or web page. That's confusing, at the very least, but also potentially downright dangerous.

title: Lord of the Rings Online 'is not going away' just because Amazon's making a Lord of the Rings MMO: 'It is beloved, it is sixteen, it is evergreen'
description: "Standing Stone has every intention of growing and supporting this community."

title: Logitech's new mouse repair partnership with iFixit isn't for gamers, yet
description: Gotta start somewhere...

title: NASA's working on a wiggly snake-like autonomous Rover alternative to 'boldly go where no robot has gone before'
description: I, for one, welcome the era of autonomous, interplanetary snakes.

title: You can buy the (wrong) photo of Tali from Mass Effect on the BioWare store
description: The real Tali Zorah comes with a Getty Images credit.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #698: Thursday, May 18
description: Help with the #698 puzzle if you need it.

title: Datamining shows Hogwarts Legacy almost had a morality and reputation system
description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good. Not that anybody cares."
